DOC.brief_summary: Cognitive-Behavioural Therapy ( CBT ) effective treatment chronic insomnia , prevalent costly problem . This pilot study compare effectiveness two brief ( 6 week ) psychological intervention deliver resident rural Manitoba use Telehealth interactive Internet-based platform . It hypothesize ) participant Telehealth condition report significantly great improvement sleep parameter ( e.g. , sleep efficiency , time awake bed , sleep-onset latency ) , insomnia severity , daytime fatigue Internet condition b ) participants Telehealth condition show well adherence treatment great satisfaction treatment Internet condition .
DOC.brief_title: Cognitive-Behavioural Therapy ( CBT ) Insomnia Via Internet Telehealth
DOC.criteria: Must resident rural Manitoba ( Canada ) Must meet research diagnostic criterion insomnia Must access computer highspeed internet Comorbid condition ( medical psychiatric ) must stable
